name: Xor-MST
description:
You are given a complete undirected graph with n vertices. A number ai is
assigned to each vertex, and the weight of an edge between vertices i and j is
equal to ai xor aj. Calculate the weight of the minimum spanning tree in this
graph. Input The first line contains n (1 ≤ n ≤ 200000) — the number of
vertices in the graph. The second line contains n integers a1, a2, ..., an (0
≤ ai < 2^30) — the numbers assigned to the vertices. Output Print one number —
the weight of the minimum spanning tree in the graph. Examples Input 5 1 2 3 4
5 Output 8 Input 4 1 2 3 4 Output 8
